author: Flo
content:
Andreas, I do envy you for living where there are so many doors that have personality. Where I live, on a suburban street in west-central New Jersey, USA, our doors are only a few generic styles and very boring.

In this image, I love the angle of the light - just perfect for showing all sorts of textures and other interesting details, like the shadows of the wrought iron below the 2nd floor windows.
